page.title: 13RELIGION IN SKELMORLIE
page.content: The only local church is the Church of Scotland and most of the population belongs to that church. The church building is very beautiful inside and pleasant from the outside and is a listed building. Attached to the church are the Sunday School,Young Folks Group,Ladies Assoc- iation,Women's Guild and Bible Study Group. In the local Mission Hall the Evan- gelical Church meets on Sunday evening and there is a meeting for children on Sunday afternoons. People who do not go to the local church go to the Episcopal Church in Largs or the Catholic Chapel near Wemyss Bay or do not go to church at all.There are very few people of other faiths in the area.
